scripts.start:search-test: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:search" "npm run dev:contact" "npm run dev:opportunity" "npm run dev:ticket" "npm run dev:product"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:contact" "npm run dev:opportunity" "npm run dev:task" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:document" "npm run dev:product" "npm run dev:invoice" "npm run dev:ticket" "npm run dev:search" "npm run dev:hr"
